Name: Base Station, Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher, Inc., Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher Inc. also known as Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher, Inc. and also known as Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher Inc for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Brooklyn.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher Inc. also known as Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher, Inc. and also known as Brooklyn Radio Dispatcher Inc for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 331 Keap Street in the borough of Brooklyn is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect immediately. 




LS#2003
7/14/1999
